Uses of Interface
sensors.UpdatingSensor

  • Packages that use UpdatingSensor 
    Package Description
    controllers  
    sensors  

    • Uses of UpdatingSensor in controllers

      Methods in controllers with parameters of type UpdatingSensor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ObstructionController.lightSensorChanged(Position position, UpdatingSensor updatingsensor, float oldValue, float newValue)
      If the measured value from the light sensor changes this method is called.
      void LineFollowController.lightSensorChanged(Position position, UpdatingSensor updatingsensor, float oldValue, float newValue) 
      void ObstructionController.ultraSonicChanged(UpdatingSensor us, float oldValue, float newValue)
      If the measured value from the ultrasonic sensor changes this method is called.

    • Uses of UpdatingSensor in sensors

      Classes in sensors that implement UpdatingSensor 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MyColorSensor 
      class  MyLightSensor
      This class holds all the utilities to control the light sensor.
      class  MyUltraSonicSensor
      This class holds all the utilities to control the ultrasonic sensor.
      Methods in sensors with parameters of type UpdatingSensor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void SensorHandler.addSensor(UpdatingSensor updatingSensor)
      adds 'updatingSensor' to the list of sensors registered to this handler
      void LightSensorListener.lightSensorChanged(Position position, UpdatingSensor updatingsensor, float oldValue, float newValue)
      When this class is being implemented, this class will be called upon when one of the light sensors' state changes.
      void SensorHandler.removeSensor(UpdatingSensor updatingSensor)
      removes 'updatingSensor' to the list of sensors registered to this handler
      void UltrasonicSensorListener.ultraSonicChanged(UpdatingSensor us, float oldValue, float newValue)
      When implemented this method can be called to do something when the measured value from the ultrasonic sensor changes
